= Class *jplex.xprototype.String*  =

== Description ==
jPlex's XPrototype extended String



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `lpad(length, character)` || `void` || Completes a string to a desired length with a character repeted to the left<br />  - `length <Integer>` Desired length of the result string - `character <String>` Optional. Character used to complete the string. Default is a blank space.||
|| `rpad(length, character)` || `String` || Completes a string to a desired length with a character repeted to the right<br />  - `length <Integer>` Desired length of the result string - `character <String>` Optional. Character used to complete the string. Default is a blank space.||
